int.name: x
int.description: First cartesian coordinate in the horizontal plane

int.name: y
int.description: Second cartesian coordinate in the horizontal plane (grad(x) x grad(y) = grad(z))

int.name: z
int.description: Vertical coordinate z

int.name: r
int.description: Major radius

int.name: phi
int.description: Toroidal angle

int.name: psi
int.description: Poloidal magnetic flux

int.name: rho_tor
int.description: The square root of the toroidal flux, sqrt((Phi-Phi_axis)/pi/B0), where Phi is the toroidal flux and B0 is the vaccum magnetic field

int.name: rho_tor_norm
int.description: The square root of the normalised toroidal flux, sqrt((Phi-Phi_axis)/(Phi_lcf-Phi_axis)), where Phi is the toroidal flux

int.name: rho_pol
int.description: The square root of the poloidal flux, sqrt(psi-psi_axis), where psi is the poloidal flux

int.name: rho_pol_norm
int.description: The square root of the normalised poloidal flux, sqrt((psi-psi_axis)/(psi_lcf-psi_axis)), where psi is the poloidal flux

int.name: theta
int.description: Geometrical poloidal angle around the magnetic axis

int.name: theta_straight
int.description: Straight field line poloidal angle

int.name: theta_equal_arc
int.description: Equal-arc poloidal angle; a differential of the angle is proportional to the length of the corresponding arc in the poloidal plane.

int.name: velocity
int.description: Total velocity; modulus of the velocity vector

int.name: velocity_x
int.description: Velocity component in the x-direction

int.name: velocity_y
int.description: Velocity component in the y-direction

int.name: velocity_z
int.description: Velocity component in the z-direction

int.name: velocity_phi
int.description: Velocity component in the toroidal direction

int.name: velocity_parallel
int.description: Velocity component parallel to the magnetic field

int.name: velocity_perpendicular
int.description: Velocity perpendicular to the magnetic field

int.name: velocity_thermal
int.description: Velocity normalised to the local thermal velocity of the thermal ions (of the relevant species)

int.name: velocity_radial
int.description: Velocity component in the radial direction

int.name: momentum
int.description: Modulus of the relativistic momentum vector

int.name: momentum_parallel
int.description: Component of the relativistic momentum vector parallel to the magnetic field

int.name: momentum_perpendicular
int.description: Component of the relativistic momentum vector perpendicular to the magnetic field

int.name: canonical_momentum_phi
int.description: Canonical toroidal angular momentum

int.name: energy_hamiltonian
int.description: Hamiltonian energy, including both kinetic and potential energy

int.name: energy_kinetic
int.description: Kinetic energy

int.name: magnetic_moment
int.description: magnetic moment

int.name: lambda
int.description: Ratio, magnetic moment over hamiltonian energy

int.name: pitch_angle
int.description: Angle between the magnetic field and the velocity vector

int.name: pitch
int.description: Ratio, parallel velocity over total velocity

int.name: pitch_at_min_b
int.description: Pitch, ratio between the parallel over the perpendicular velocity, at the minimum value of the magnetic field strength along the guiding centre orbit

int.name: n_tor
int.description: Toroidal mode number, the wave vector toroidal component being defined as k_tor = n_tor grad phi where phi is the toroidal angle so that a positive n_tor means a wave propagating in the positive phi direction
